senses.de: The type of job that someone does, especially after studying it
senses.ex: Amanda is considering a profession in health care.

Tips.title: Educational Requirement
Tips.description: A profession usually requires formal education or qualifications.
Tips.example: Becoming a lawyer is a profession that requires a law degree.

Tips.title: Skill Specialization
Tips.description: Professions often involve specialized knowledge or skills.
Tips.example: Architecture is a profession focusing on designing buildings.

Tips.title: Profession vs Job
Tips.description: Not all jobs are professions; professions generally require more training.
Tips.example: Working in retail is a job, while practicing medicine is a profession.

senses.de: An act of openly and solemnly stating a belief or intention
senses.ex: Sarah made a profession of her love for Joseph in front of everyone.

Tips.title: Public Statement
Tips.description: A profession in legal and solemn contexts means to declare something publicly.
Tips.example: He made a profession of his commitment to the truth during the trial.

Tips.title: Emotional Weight
Tips.description: A profession can carry emotional significance, especially in personal relationships.
Tips.example: Her profession of trust in him strengthened their friendship.

senses.de: A group of people who have a similar occupation, especially one that needs specialist training or skill
senses.ex: Lawyers and doctors are part of the same profession.

Tips.title: Group Identity
Tips.description: The term can also refer to a collective body of people in the same field.
Tips.example: He was proud to be part of the medical profession.

Tips.title: Professional Standards
Tips.description: Members of a profession often adhere to ethical standards and regulations.
Tips.example: She was disbarred for not upholding the standards of the legal profession.

senses.de: The act of entering a religious order and taking vows
senses.ex: After his profession, the monk moved to the monastery.

Tips.title: Religious Commitment
Tips.description: In a religious context, it refers to taking vows or formally joining a religious life.
Tips.example: His profession into the order was a significant spiritual event.

Tips.title: Lifetime Vow
Tips.description: A religious profession often implies a lifelong commitment.
Tips.example: Her religious profession marked the beginning of a life dedicated to service.

senses.de: The act of declaring or admitting openly
senses.ex: His profession of faith moved the crowd.

Tips.title: Sincerity Expression
Tips.description: It can involve expressing sincere beliefs, emotions, or intentions.
Tips.example: His profession of sorrow was received with empathy by the audience.

Art.wordDefinition:
Art refers to a creative skill or ability, often used in reference to things like painting, sculpture, music, or writing.

Art usually involves self-expression and can be pursued as a hobby or passion.

While both art and profession involve skills and knowledge, they are different in terms of their purpose and application.

Art is typically pursued for personal enjoyment or as a means of expression, while a profession is pursued as a means of earning a living and contributing to society through one's specialized skills and expertise.

Call.wordDefinition:
Call refers to a strong inner feeling or desire to pursue a particular type of work or occupation. It is something that feels like a personal mission or purpose in life.

For instance, somebody may feel called to become a teacher, doctor, or artist.

It is a career that is typically governed by a set of ethical standards, requires specialized skills and knowledge, and involves a certain level of responsibility.

Call relates to a personal sense of mission or purpose, while profession refers to a particular type of skilled occupation or career.

Career.wordDefinition:
A career is a person's continuous professional journey through a number of jobs or positions in a particular field or industry.

For instance, someone might choose a career in healthcare and work in a variety of positions such as a nurse, physician, or healthcare administrator.

A career is an overarching term for the journey of someone’s working life while profession is a specific occupation within a particular field of work.

Craft.wordDefinition:
Craft refers to a skill or trade that involves making things by hand or with tools.

It is often associated with traditional or creative activities such as woodworking, pottery, or knitting. Craft is a form of work that requires a high level of skill and precision, but is not necessarily tied to formal education or training.

Craft and profession represent different kinds of work that require different levels of expertise and training.

While craft is often associated with traditional or creative activities, profession is more commonly used to refer to specialized fields that require formal education and credentials.

Occupation.wordDefinition:
The difference between occupation and profession is that an occupation is any job that someone does to earn money, while a profession is a job that requires specialized knowledge and skills, usually acquired through education or training.

For example, working at a grocery store is an occupation, but being a doctor or a lawyer is a profession.

A profession usually requires more education or training and has stricter requirements and standards than an occupation.

The term ‘occupation’ tends to be used more broadly and describes any work that someone does to earn a living, while ‘profession’ is used more narrowly to refer to jobs that require specialized skills, often regulated by licensing or professional associations.

Trade.wordDefinition:
A trade usually involves skilled manual work that requires practical skills, training and expertise such as carpentry, plumbing, electrician, etc.

Tradespeople usually learn their skills through an apprenticeship program or trade school and are regulated by professional or trade organizations.

In summary, professions are specialized careers that require higher education or training, while trades are skilled manual work that requires expertise in a particular field.

Vocation.wordDefinition:
A vocation is a calling to a particular career or way of life, often with a religious or spiritual connotation, such as being a priest or nun.

A profession is applicable to any field that requires specialized skills and knowledge, whereas a vocation is applicable to fields that involve a strong sense of calling or purpose, often related to religious or spiritual beliefs.

However, there is some overlap between the two terms, and some professions may be considered vocational in nature.

Work.wordDefinition:
Work refers to any job or employment that may or may not require a particular skill set.

Work can be applied to any job, from manual labor to desk jobs.

Profession is a specific type of work that requires advanced education or specialized knowledge, while work encompasses all types of jobs or tasks.

quotes.Text: I think many women are successful in their professional lives - they are making the money and all that - but in their personal lives are a complete mess, because they haven't paid any attention to it, because they spent all of their time being successful.
quotes.Title: American Actress
quotes.Name: Viola Davis

quotes.Text: I study the universe. It's the second oldest profession. People have been looking up for a long time.
quotes.Title: American Scientist
quotes.Name: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.Text: I am who I am: I have my life experiences and my professional experiences.
quotes.Title: Canadian Journalist
quotes.Name: George Stroumboulopoulos

quotes.Text: I was in constant demand, in my professional life and my personal life.
quotes.Title: Austrian Actress
quotes.Name: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.Text: My professional and personal roots in Alabama are deep and lasting.
quotes.Title: American Activist
quotes.Name: Coretta Scott King

quotes.Text: I have never let the personal life affect my professional life.
quotes.Name: Yuzvendra Chahal

quotes.Text: I enjoy the work, I enjoy every minute of my professional life.
quotes.Title: Portuguese Coach
quotes.Name: Jose Mourinho

quotes.Text: I have a lot of respect for what I do, for this profession.
quotes.Title: American Actor
quotes.Name: Jeffrey Dean Morgan

quotes.Text: I'm a grown man, a professional, and a world champion.
quotes.Title: American Boxer
quotes.Name: Jermall Charlo

quotes.Text: My profession has helped me to grow up.
quotes.Title: Chinese Actress
quotes.Name: Zhang Ziyi
